title: CS Competency Enhancement: Metaphoring-Based Short Story Creation Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic writing structures and literary expressions
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can draft creative short stories of over 300 characters by applying a metaphoring approach
Learners can derive at least three specific revision proposals through peer feedback sessions
Learners can apply five or more literary devices including figurative expressions to actual writing

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
